name: Mindfulness of breath
description: Exercises focus on bringing awareness to the process of breathing.

name: Tension release meditation
description: Become self-aware with this 15 minute guided meditation

name: Sitting meditation
description: Use the breath as the central focus of the practice. At times they incorporate awareness of sounds, bodily sensations, thoughts or feelings.

name: Self guided mindfulness exercises
description: Audio tracks begin and end with the sound of a bell ringing, to orientate you through your own practice
